TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content:
Yes indeed. Once entered, You will never be able to return.

And those who try to escape are captured by Chobit and locked up, murdered or worse...

And those who try to escape are captured by Chobit and locked up, murdered or worse...

Get trapped in the realm of PfL. I assume that's where I will end up, only as a drawing trapped in the realm of PfL.

Possibly locked in a polar Kerbol orbit with no delta-v.

(I'm tired I should probably go to bed now.)

Edited May 3, 2013 by hawkinator

Oh no. The holy lord of Chobit will probably not punish you that much.

She'll probably just turn you into a cat and then lock you up in her house on Laythe.

Oh no. The holy lord of Chobit will probably not punish you that much.

IT IS INEVITABLE. Right, chobit?

If I don't become part of an Aperture Science Artificial Personality Construct, that is most certiainly where I will end up.

Wait, you don't want to be her pet? Too bad... The decision is already made.

Oh and:

Also, I am not a cat, contrary to popular belief.

Is not so true anymore.
'And so our good friend ROLF's tall ends" (RESTART)

Just a question, but don't you mean tale (A type of story)?

Because the word "tall" is not a noun.

Just a question, but don't you mean tale (A type of story)?

Because the word "tall" is not a noun.

Thank you for pointing that out ' I be dum'
You're welcome.
*sittin' back with popcorn* I have no Kerbinly idea what you nutters are doing but it is providing nearly endless entertainment
He started! *points at ROFLCopter64bit*

He started! *points at ROFLCopter64bit*

Or did the FUTURE him do it? O_o (plot twist)
No, It was you! You should've listened to the holy goddess! Now you shall pay!

Well! A lot has happened while I was working on finals!

But....apparently I'm the only one in the US that watches this thread as your posts start at 1am and continue till 11am!

On topic: nice sketch!

Believe me! The future him did it! He time traveled into the past to say it and then is mind-controlling you to blame it on me! Quick, I'm going to go into the near future to stop him before this ever happened!

The goddess of Laythe forbids time travel. If you do not obey... The consequences are yours...

Edit: Just noticed: this thread has more views than any of the sticky threads.
I have returned from the future! I think he has been stopped. Wait, what's this? A T1M3 P4R4D0X H4LPZHDDA847LEUFG439598|}}{)*79$^%##&%(&^$%^*&^$&^*$%^*^%$$^^$^%#^
Post 200! YAY!

I beg you oh holy Chobit. Please make an end to this mess. They are violating your law! And hacking my comp...

10101000101001011111010001001010101

It's 15-5-2013, I have been sent to prevent WW III to begin, by stopping this nonsense. I don't have much time as the invading country is hacking the NATO. 011100101011010100010101001001000111001

Anyone can travel to the future, just wait.

Not exactly... ehm...

I have returned from the future!

I am ShachonianX from another dimension! My counterpart has caused a paradox, which has resulted in his death! The only way to end the paradox is to create another one which will result in both paradoxes ripping each other apart, saving the universe! Because I don't have time travel capabilities, someone else must do it for me! I shall now return to my home dimension!
FOR THE LOVE OF PEACE AND TRANQUILITY! Will you two stop it, this is for conversation on ART, specifically Chobits!
